column3: If wallettools folder is empty, that should also be removed, didn't look into it ^^.\n
I believe it has, or at least in my repo it is. \n

I'm fine with removing them.

Indeed, bitrpc.py provides the same functionality with regard to `walletpassphrase` / `walletpassphrasechange`.

```
            pwd = raw_input("Enter wallet passphrase: ")
            access.walletpassphrase(pwd, 60)
```

IMO what would be nice functionality is parsing rpcuser/rpcpass from the bitcoin.conf like bitcoind/bitcoin-cli does, instead of asking f
@laanwj Noted. Will take a look at that when I throw in my bitrpc changes. \n

I wonder how many people are using these utilities actively, and if they know they can use bitrpc.py for the same.

I find only one mention of the utilities in a 2011 topic on bitcointalk, by Gavin: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=54671.10

See also issue #2318

To avoid any confusion, I will add this info to the README in the next
commit.
